titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week beginning May 11, 2008, as "National Nursing Home Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
5/15/2008--Introduced.
Expresses support for the designation of a National Nursing Home Week. Recognizes that a majority of people in the United States will require long-term services at some point.
Honors nursing home residents and the people who care for them.
